data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Tang, Liang, Li, Li-Zhen, Ruzicka, Jan (2011): Notes on the genus Apteroloma of China with description of a new species (Coleoptera, Agyrtidae). ZooKeys 124: 19-39, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.124.1774, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.124.1774
